title: ngx-ever-components - Angular Library
description: ngx-ever-components is a modern library of user interface (UI) components for Angular, designed to enhance the user interface of applications while simplifying development time. With a wide collection of elegant components, it empowers Angular developers to easily create visually appealing and intuitive interfaces. Whether you're building a web application, a dashboard, or any other Angular-based project, ngx-ever-components provides the tools you need to elevate both aesthetics and productivity.

title: ngx-ever-components - Documentation
description: Official documentation for the ngx-ever-components library, a styling library for Angular. Here you will find comprehensive information about the npm package, repository, installation guide, usage, and detailed documentation for each component of the library.

title: AI Driver
description: AI Driver is a Hybrid Mobile App for Android/iOS developed in conjunction with OpenAI's API to perform applications with artificial intelligence. The app allows the user to learn and take theoretical tests for driving evaluations in different types of licenses (AM, A1, A2, A, B, B1, B+E, C1).

title: Fasfu Burgers
description: Fasfu Burgers is a real-time pick-up delivery application created for Fasfu Burgers restaurant. This prototype allows you to order your favorite food online. The application was created for Luisito Comunica's food company.

title: Luck
description: Luck is a platform based on creating raffles as content creators. The purpose of this application is to improve communication between the public and deliver prizes to the closest community.

title: AI Decisions
description: AI Decisions is a Hybrid Mobile App for Android/iOS developed in conjunction with OpenAI's API to perform applications with artificial intelligence. The app involves the user providing certain decisions, and the AI will make evaluations to provide the best decision based on making the best choices for the person.

title: AI StoryBooks
description: AI StoryBooks is a Web Application developed in conjunction with the OpenAI API to perform applications with artificial intelligence. This application consists of creating stories with AI based on a description we send, such as writing 'a story about a cat playing soccer on the moon'. This story will be automatically generated by the AI and stored in a local/Redux store so we can read it at any time.

title: AI Chat - English/Spanish Learning
description: AI Chat is a Hybrid Mobile App for Android/iOS developed in conjunction with OpenAI's API to perform applications with artificial intelligence. The app consists of generating various chats with different types of conversations/topics to maintain a conversation with an AI (GPT 3.5). The idea of the application is to learn to maintain a written conversation in English, thus if there is an error in our spelling, it will correct us by indicating the correct form of the sent sentence, and always trying to generate the longest conversation possible.

title: inWork
description: InWork is a web platform for a single-page application (SPA) that facilitates the search for new job opportunities. On this platform, users can register as 'job seekers', specifying their skill set (stack), and thus search for job opportunities that match their skills. They can also register as companies, and post job offers that match the required skill set, to match job seekers with similar skills.

title: AI Calories
description: AI Calories is a Hybrid Mobile App for Android/iOS developed in conjunction with the OpenAI API to perform applications with artificial intelligence. The app consists of managing the calories we consume, divided into a calorie calculator and an AI that helps us better manage our food depending on our weight, height, etc.

title: Bash Routing
description: Bash Routing is a creative Web SPA that consists of a very cool template in which we control the entire app through a web-created terminal with attractive designs. In this, we can execute commands like 'cd to navigate to a path' or 'ls to display all the app's paths'.

title: Quick Weather
description: Quick Weather is a Hybrid Mobile App for Android/iOS, its purpose is to view the approximate current temperature of the current location displaying a summary of the next 6 days.

title: EVERCODE
description: EVERCODE is a landing page that clearly presents a company offering technological solutions.

title: EVERCODE Services
description: EVERCODE Services is a landing page that clearly presents the services offered by EVERCODE, a technology company.

title: Dummy Store
description: Dummy Store is a product sales prototype for a technology company (smartphones, laptops, etc).

title: Besign Invest
description: Besign Invest is a creative landing template.

title: Vanderbilt
description: Vanderbilt is a website developed for a springs business in Quito, Ecuador. This website provides a clear representation of the company and its available products.
